description:
The unisex Catch and Release Smock is a new addition to the Spring/Summer 2023 collection. This mid-layer is perfect for any adventure on the river. Made of 100% recycled polyester polar fleece and PFC-free durable water repellent, the smock is designed to be worn on fly fishing days or canoeing expeditions to keep you warm and dry.

A waterproof and breathable 3-layer fabric made of 100% polyester is used for the sleeves and forearms to allow you to dip your arms in the water to get your catch out and put your salmon back in the river after a well-won battle. The adjustable waterproof cuffs add protection against water infiltration and ensure waterproofing for both men and women. That means you can paddle as hard and as long as your arms allow you without getting wet.

Two YKK® zippered pockets were added at the waist to keep your hands warm or to store extra gear so you can focus on what's going on in the river. The hood also has a hem and drawstring to keep you warm and protected from mosquitoes.

This technical hoodie is tested and approved by fly fishermen and paddle sports professionals. Just like them, it will become a must-have for any outdoor enthusiast.

Since this is a unisex product, we suggest all adventurous women size down from what they would typically wear for a garment specifically designed for women.
name: Hooke Catch & Release Smock - Unisex
